name: HealthyPlaneDemo
description:
Healthy Plane is a side-scroller difficulty shooter game!

You have to survive 10 waves while destroying the unhealthy food!

In the game have 15 level, but in the demo only the first 3 level playable!

Destroy unhealthy foods, avoid fat and sugar, complete the levels and dominate the leaderboard!(In demo don't have leaderboard :D).

I need feedback from the game so please download and test it! :D Thank you!
